title: can you like fuck off flex queue and give us a 1v1 ranked mode
body:
is anyone else sick of playing summoners rift and flat out losing alot of times because of dickhead team mates and usually wasting 30-50 minutes on this crap?

get rid of flex queue and make a 1v1 ranked mode ffs. why you need it anyway is beyond me.

best of 3 so 3 rounds were you can choose a different or the same champ each time. , first blood 100 cs or first tower wins, fast games, low queue times and not having to deal with total dumbass's every fucking game, you lose your responsible.

fucking do it and make alot of people happy

replies.body:
They actually released a 1v1 mode called Snowdown Showdown a few years back, and it was one of the [most unpopular modes Riot ever made](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/04/ask-riot-snowdown-showdown-and-pro-kills/).

I'm not saying 1v1 modes suck, I'm just saying that you're forgetting that not everyone is solo player like you. A **huge** portion of the community just log-in to play with friends, and don't really care for solo queue and 1v1s. 

Removing Flex queue and replacing it with a 1v1 mode, would give 'team players' the same feeling that solo players had during the Dynamic Queue debacle. And I don't think Riot wants to make that mistake again :D

Stats talk.

I think it would be more popular then you make it out to be, also your basing this off a cheap half assed rotating game made

Unfortunately there's no official data :(

But there was a very large community poll with a sample of 37,500 votes. It asked whether players would play Dynamic queue or Solo queue. [40% of the people in the poll](http://www.strawpoll.me/6583984/r) said they would play Dynamic queue. And that's not taking into account casual players who are far less likely to be in League forums where this was shared.

But even the fact that Flex queue exists is proof enough that many many players enjoy team play more than solo. It really wouldn't be fair to strip that from them.

I agree that some people may like the team part but why not do both. Have ranked flex for those who want to team with friends, ranked solo/duo like usual, and have a ranked 1v1 mode. #wouldmakethingsmoreinteresting{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}

Yeah two modes is absolutely something I'd get behind, in our case we just have to be weary that we can't support too many queues at a good level. But having it on certain days like we do with Ranked 3v3 could work.
They should just bring back the old ranked 5's tbh.
